body_html:
One could repurpose the code which makes sparse tensors feedable / fetchable to do that.

Right now to unblock you simply pass st.value, st.indices, and st.shape to the py_func where you can make a SparseTensorValue out of them.
body_text:
One could repurpose the code which makes sparse tensors feedable / fetchable to do that.
Right now to unblock you simply pass st.value, st.indices, and st.shape to the py_func where you can make a SparseTensorValue out of them.
body:
One could repurpose the code which makes sparse tensors feedable / fetchable to do that.

Right now to unblock you simply pass st.value, st.indices, and st.shape to the py_func where you can make a SparseTensorValue out of them.
